verbs.description: [ARG0: he] [V: built] [ARG1: his own coffin] [ARGM-TMP: after getting cancer] he now eight months in remission and all that remains is a casket he built for himself 15 years ago when he was supposed to die now that casket is a prop on the front lawn plano joey page
